summary: To avoid scandal, a rising scientist scrambles to retrieve an inscribed garter from an old flame on the eve of her wedding.
cast: Dennis O'Keefe|Marie McDonald|Barry Sullivan|Binnie Barnes|Sheila Ryan|J. Carrol Naish|Jerome Cowan|Vera Marshe|Don Beddoe|Frank Fenton|Russell Hicks|Kenner G. Kemp|Richard LeGrand|Frank O'Connor|Joey Ray|Larry Steers
title: Getting Gertie's Garter
